amendment.description: Amendment directed GAO to conduct a study on factors contributing to bridge construction and rehabilitation delays and ways to expedite construction projects.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 110-760 to request the GAO to conduct a study on factors contributing to bridge construction and rehabilitation delays and ways to expedite construction projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shays amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Shays amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Shays.
